item.description:
Hey Indie Rock Boston,

This is going to be the first non-concert meetup for the group. I'm going to see Michael Showalter and Michael Ian Black (Wet Hot American Summer, The State) at the Somerville Theater this Thursday november 29th at 7:30PM. Somverville Theater is located right off the Red Line at Davis Sq and there is also a good sized parking lot in Davis Sq if you are driving.

I was thinking that we could have a meetup after the show at Johnny Ds which is right across the street from the theater for a drink or if anybody wants some food. Johnny Ds has good food and are especially known for their jazz brunch on Saturday and Sunday. It should be a great show and I hope that some other people from the group will be going and want to meetup. We'll meetup outside of Johnny Ds following the show. Give me a call when you are outside or if you have any questions or concerns. 701-331-0920

Michael
item.name: Michael Ian Black and Michael Showalter - Thursday
